document.docAuthor: Floriano, Carla Fernanda Burguez, Moreira, Felipe Ferraz Figueiredo, Bispo, Pitágoras Da Conceição, Morales, Irina & Molano-Rendón, Fredy
document.masterDocTitle: A new species of Mesovelia (Heteroptera: Gerromorpha: Mesoveliidae) from South America, with identification key and notes on Colombian species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A new species of Mesovelia (Heteroptera: Gerromorpha: Mesoveliidae) from South America, with identification key and notes on Colombian species

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Mesovelia bisignata
Uhler, 1884 : 274
. Synonym by Champion (1898) .

Diagnosis. Male. Mesofemur ventrally with a row of spinules; abdominal tergum VIII with posterior margin rounded; abdominal pleuron VIII without tubercle; abdominal sternum VI with posterior margin rounded, without fringe of black spinules; abdominal sternum VIII with two lateroposterior patches formed by black spinules; paramere with margins converging ( Fig. 3 B).

Measurements (mm). Male Dep. Magdalena / Valle del Cauca / Quindío / Cesar .
body length 3.05 / 3.07 / 3.05 / 3.05; head length 0.50 / 0.55 / 0.52 / 0.50; head width through eyes 0.30 / 0.34 / 0.30 / 0.31; head width through antenniferous tubercles 0.45 / 0.48 / 0.45 / 0.45; antennomere I 0.62 / 0.66 / 0.64 / 0.62; antennomere II 0.62 / 0.66 / 0.62 / 0.63; antennomere III 0.79 / 0.80 / 0.79 / 0.80; antennomere IV 0.82 / 0.84 / 0.82 / 0.84; FORE LEG , femoral length 0.92 / 0.94 / 0.93 / 0.93; tibial length 0.78 / 0.80 / 0.80 / 0.78; MID LEG , femoral length 1.18 / 1.20 / 1.20 / 1.18; tibial length 1.25 / 1.27 / 1.25 / 1.27; HIND LEG , femoral length 1.51 / 1.50 / 1.52 / 1.50; tibial length 2.07 / 2.08 / 2.10 / 2.08.
Female Dep. Valle del Cauca / Quindío / Cesar .
body length 3.60 / 3.60 / 3.63 / 3.66; head length 0.70 / 0.75 / 0.72 / 0.70; head width through eyes 0.59 / 0.54 / 0.59 / 0.58; head width through antenniferous tubercles 0.65 / 0.68 / 0.65 / 0.65; antennomere I 0.52 / 0.56 / 0.54 / 0.52; antennomere II 0.52 / 0.56 / 0.52 / 0.53; antennomere III 0.89 / 0.85 / 0.89 / 0.85; antennomere IV 0.85 / 0.84 / 0.85 / 0.84; FORE LEG , femoral length 0.92 / 0.95 / 0.92 / 0.93; tibial length 0.85 / 0.83 / 0.80 / 0.85; MID LEG , femoral length 1.18 / 1.20 / 1.22 / 1.18; tibial length 1.25 / 1.27 / 1.25 / 1.27; HIND LEG , femoral length 1.53 / 1.53 / 1.52 / 1.50; tibial length 2.07 / 2.08 / 2.10 / 2.08.
